<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Push this on last so that it gets deleted after all the others.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Return the new allocation value so that we can check for needed spills.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a264176188c0aadccd3ca5b6929b5a2e1aea571dc00aef155a16d4e7e1861e1682">Alloc</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We need to make room to insert a spill after initial PHIs, but before</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// catchswitch instruction. Placing it before violates the requirement that</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// catchswitch, like all other EHPads must be the first nonPHI in a block.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Split away catchswitch into a separate block and insert in its place:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   cleanuppad &lt;InsertPt&gt; cleanupret.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// cleanupret instruction will act as an insert point for the spill.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/coro/anonymous-spillutils-cpp-/#aedc5ca2a4ef6009dc69a410d60c7eeaf"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/coro/anonymous-spillutils-cpp-/#aedc5ca2a4ef6009dc69a410d60c7eeaf">splitBeforeCatchSwitch</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/catchswitchinst">CatchSwitchInst</a> &#42;CatchSwitch) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;CurrentBlock = CatchSwitch-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-detail/node-parent-access/#a7e19e7508415378ad9523e0339b23e22">getParent</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;CleanupPad =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cleanuppadinst/#afa8a6a49b80d4ca3bd0881fe4383c511">CleanupPadInst::Create</a>(CatchSwitch-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/catchswitchinst/#a74d56dd1a8531d108c9b4883bfff61a6">getParentPad</a>(), &#123;&#125;, </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, CurrentBlock);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;CleanupRet =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cleanupreturninst/#a7e19664720f1c4693b788b018d08758c">CleanupReturnInst::Create</a>(CleanupPad, NewBlock, CurrentBlock);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CleanupRet;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We use a pointer use visitor to track how an alloca is being used.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The goal is to be able to answer the following three questions:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   1 Should this alloca be allocated on the frame instead.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   2 Could the content of the alloca be modified prior to CoroBegin, which</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      would require copying the data from the alloca to the frame after</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      CoroBegin.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   3 Are there any aliases created for this alloca prior to CoroBegin, but</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      used after CoroBegin. In that case, we will need to recreate the alias</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      after CoroBegin based off the frame.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// To answer question 1, we track two things:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   A. List of all BasicBlocks that use this alloca or any of the aliases of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   the alloca. In the end, we check if there exists any two basic blocks that</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   cross suspension points. If so, this alloca must be put on the frame.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   B. Whether the alloca or any alias of the alloca is escaped at some point,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   either by storing the address somewhere, or the address is used in a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   function call that might capture. If it&#39;s ever escaped, this alloca must be</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   put on the frame conservatively.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// To answer quetion 2, we track through the variable MayWriteBeforeCoroBegin.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Whenever a potential write happens, either through a store instruction, a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// function call or any of the memory intrinsics, we check whether this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instruction is prior to CoroBegin.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// To answer question 3, we track the offsets of all aliases created for the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// alloca prior to CoroBegin but used after CoroBegin. std::optional is used to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// be able to represent the case when the offset is unknown (e.g. when you have</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// a PHINode that takes in different offset values). We cannot handle unknown</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// offsets and will assert. This is the potential issue left out. An ideal</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// solution would likely require a significant redesign.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/coro/anonymous-spillutils-cpp-/anonymous-spillutils-cpp-"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">namespace </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coro/anonymous-namespace-spillutils-cpp-/anonymous-namespace-spillutils-cpp-/allocausevisitor"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">struct </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coro/anonymous-namespace-spillutils-cpp-/anonymous-namespace-spillutils-cpp-/allocausevisitor/#a5a7dd3f145f4927fa6bd942c6fcad594">AllocaUseVisitor</a> : <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ptrusevisitor/#a564995c967b0a398c32f31a41b4418c1">PtrUseVisitor</a>&lt;AllocaUseVisitor&gt; &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Regardless whether the alias of the alloca is the value operand or the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// pointer operand, we need to assume the alloca is been written.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>.getValueOperand() != <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/detail/ptrusevisitorbase/#ac1e78f8a1f204bed8ad26681199fa16b">U</a>-&gt;get())</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We are storing the pointer into a memory location, potentially escaping.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// As an optimization, we try to detect simple cases where it doesn&#39;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// actually escape, for example:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   %ptr = alloca ..</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   %addr = alloca ..</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   store %ptr, %addr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   %x = load %addr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   ..</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If %addr is only used by loading from it, we could simply treat %x as</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// another alias of %ptr, and not considering %ptr being escaped.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> IsSimpleStoreThenLoad = &#91;&amp;&#93;() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;AI = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;AllocaInst&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>.getPointerOperand());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the memory location we are storing to is not an alloca, it</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// could be an alias of some other memory locations, which is difficult</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to analyze.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!AI)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">mutable</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::optional&lt;bool&gt; ShouldLiveOnFrame&#123;&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> computeShouldLiveOnFrame()</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If lifetime information is available, we check it first since it&#39;s</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// more precise. We look at every pair of lifetime.start intrinsic and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// every basic block that uses the pointer to see if they cross suspension</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// points. The uses cover both direct uses as well as indirect uses.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ShouldUseLifetimeStartInfo &amp;&amp; !LifetimeStarts.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimplbase/#af8a50544090e81ac83601aff8f4b0142">empty</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If there is no explicit lifetime.end, then assume the address can</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// cross suspension points.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LifetimeEndBBs.empty())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If there is a path from a lifetime.start to a suspend without a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// corresponding lifetime.end, then the alloca&#39;s lifetime persists</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// beyond that suspension point and the alloca must go on the frame.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8fc529c79977cdd01e187986f960a07f">llvm::SmallVector&lt;BasicBlock &#42;&gt;</a> Worklist(LifetimeStartBBs);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a828f756cea7deec4b58080a7e499137c">isManyPotentiallyReachableFromMany</a>(Worklist, CoroSuspendBBs,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><Highlight kind="normal">                                             &amp;LifetimeEndBBs, &amp;DT))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Addresses are guaranteed to be identical after every lifetime.start so</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// we cannot use the local stack if the address escaped and there is a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// suspend point between lifetime markers. This should also cover the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// case of a single lifetime.start intrinsic in a loop with suspend point.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (PI.isEscaped()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a> : LifetimeStarts) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a> : LifetimeStarts) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><Highlight kind="normal">            </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Checker.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/suspendcrossinginfo/#ad7b0b1b552021b1e8f080f4e79253853">hasPathOrLoopCrossingSuspendPoint</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>-&gt;getParent(),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><Highlight kind="normal">                                                          <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>-&gt;getParent()))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><Highlight kind="normal">              </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><Highlight kind="normal">          &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// FIXME: Ideally the isEscaped check should come at the beginning.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// However there are a few loose ends that need to be fixed first before</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// we can do that. We need to make sure we are not over-conservative, so</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// that the data accessed in-between await&#95;suspend and symmetric transfer</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// is always put on the stack, and also data accessed after coro.end is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// always put on the stack (esp the return object). To fix that, we need</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  1) Potentially treat sret as nocapture in calls</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  2) Special handle the return object and put it on the stack</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  3) Utilize lifetime.end intrinsic</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (PI.isEscaped())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;U1 : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/ivusers-cpp/#a4e5b9edb51eec9dbca592075eb64dfcb">Users</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;U2 : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/ivusers-cpp/#a4e5b9edb51eec9dbca592075eb64dfcb">Users</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Checker.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/suspendcrossinginfo/#a184a65eb9ac1cd8093ea44d3490b3e70">isDefinitionAcrossSuspend</a>(&#42;U1, U2))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="595"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// from the coroutine function.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="596"><Highlight kind="normal">    Arg-&gt;getParent()-&gt;removeParamAttr(Arg-&gt;getArgNo(), Attribute::NoCapture);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="597"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;CSI = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;AnyCoroSuspendInst&gt;</a>(Def)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="598"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Don&#39;t spill immediately after a suspend; splitting assumes</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="599"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// that the suspend will be followed by a branch.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="600"><Highlight kind="normal">    InsertPt = CSI-&gt;getParent()-&gt;getSingleSuccessor()-&gt;getFirstNonPHIIt();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="601"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="602"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(Def);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="603"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!DT.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortree/#a5c69311e8d44898dac36a155c3d8691d">dominates</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coro/shape">Shape</a>.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coro/shape/#abfb56acef5d60fefb2edc417f0bfbda0">CoroBegin</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="604"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If it is not dominated by CoroBegin, then spill should be</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="605"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// inserted immediately after CoroFrame is computed.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="606"><Highlight kind="normal">      InsertPt = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coro/shape">Shape</a>.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coro/shape/#ac406c2b5a7e2d11174becab5cb27765d">getInsertPtAfterFramePtr</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="607"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;InvokeInst&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="608"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we are spilling the result of the invoke instruction, split</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="609"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the normal edge and insert the spill in the new block.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="610"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;NewBB = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#adf83581f514774264d616eef5706cf6e">SplitEdge</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a>-&gt;getParent(), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a>-&gt;getNormalDest());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="611"><Highlight kind="normal">      InsertPt = NewBB-&gt;getTerminator()-&gt;getIterator();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00612" /><CodeLine lineNumber="612"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;PHINode&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00613" /><CodeLine lineNumber="613"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Skip the PHINodes and EH pads instructions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="614"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;DefBlock = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;getParent();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="615"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;CSI = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;CatchSwitchInst&gt;</a>(DefBlock-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#aef9e9fcf4c5dfce90276ca16d91b8e46">getTerminator</a>()))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="616"><Highlight kind="normal">        InsertPt = splitBeforeCatchSwitch(CSI)-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-node-impl/#af719fc783be6589465137d997701a432">getIterator</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="617"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="618"><Highlight kind="normal">        InsertPt = DefBlock-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a161fd4e9fa5367f64c2a4c9e921c3ad3">getFirstInsertionPt</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="619"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="620"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;isTerminator() &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;unexpected terminator&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="621"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For all other values, the spill is placed immediately after</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="622"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the definition.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="623"><Highlight kind="normal">      InsertPt = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;getNextNode()-&gt;getIterator();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="624"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="625"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
